pullRequest.body:
The code is copied from `GroupTheory/Congruence.lean`, and then modified to fix the errors.

I haven't copied the full contents of `GroupTheory/Congruencee`, only the results about the lattice structure.

This replaces leanprover-community/mathlib#18588


---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

nodes.body: Primarily because they requested cleanup that seemed out of scope (which is what the other PR i made is for). I'm happy to make this one depend on that one.
I'm happy for the cleanups to happen later if you pinky-promise to actually do them.

> What's the status wrt to the unresolved comments on the mathlib3 PR?

I now intend to address them, but have not checked that I have done so.

> What's the status wrt to the unresolved comments on the mathlib3 PR?

I've resolved all the comments there that are addressed here. I don't think your `distrib` suggestions are obviously true, and would rather not take on proving new mathematical results as part of this PR.
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by YaelDillies.

Thanks!

maintainer merge

```suggestion
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_inf {c d : RingCon R} : â‡‘(c âŠ“ d) = â‡‘c âŠ“ â‡‘d :=
```
probably in other places too
This should be obtained by pullback
Pullback won't obtain `inf` for me, and for lines 479 and 480 it hardly seems worth it as the proof is already trivial.
Would  you prefer I use `inf_le_left c _ := (inf_le_left : _ â‰¤ c.toSetoid)` instead of `fun _ _ h => h.1`?
Are you not missing `coe_sInf`, `coe_iInf`?
`iInf` is missing for `Con` and `AddCon`; but it's trivial, so I've added it there too. `coe_sInf` was already here, but with the old name, now corrected.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(RingTheory/Congruence): add the `CompleteLattice` instance

nodes.body: Is there a specific reason you did not act on my comments on https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/18588 ? Would you mind doing so?
Primarily because they requested cleanup that seemed out of scope (which is what the other PR i made is for). I'm happy to make this one depend on that one.
I'm happy for the cleanups to happen later if you pinky-promise to actually do them.
What's the status wrt to the unresolved comments on the mathlib3 PR?

> What's the status wrt to the unresolved comments on the mathlib3 PR?

I now intend to address them, but have not checked that I have done so.

> What's the status wrt to the unresolved comments on the mathlib3 PR?

I've resolved all the comments there that are addressed here. I don't think your `distrib` suggestions are obviously true, and would rather not take on proving new mathematical results as part of this PR.

Thanks!
